debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, NVIDIA Corporation had total debt of $27,307 million. The company's leverage ratio was 1.18x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: NVIDIA Corporation reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 18.5%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
